body_html:
Thanks! Tests should hopefully pass now (they do on my CUDA 9.0 instance).
If this is true, the PR is complete on my end.

Since we're at it, writing tests has unearthed a possible JIT bug. Running GraphExecutor on a trace after a fuse pass leads to a segfault (it's unrelated to this PR).

torch._C._jit_pass_fuse(trace.graph())
graph = trace.graph()
ge = torch._C.GraphExecutor(graph, False)
out = ge(*inputs)

Does this ring a bell?

body:
Thanks! Tests should hopefully pass now (they do on my CUDA 9.0 instance).
If this is true, the PR is complete on my end.

Since we're at it, writing tests has unearthed a possible JIT bug. Running GraphExecutor on a trace after a fuse pass leads to a segfault (it's unrelated to this PR).
```
torch._C._jit_pass_fuse(trace.graph())
graph = trace.graph()
ge = torch._C.GraphExecutor(graph, False)
out = ge(*inputs)
```
Does this ring a bell?
